summary: Iteration 47 - Testing Speed Control, PWA Icons/Screenshots, Expanded Podcast Feeds. Backend: 10/10 tests passed. Frontend: All 14 requested features verified.
critical_code_review_comments: PASS: /api/podcasts returns episodes from 10 expanded podcast feeds (The Daily, BBC Global, NPR, TED Talks, etc.)
PASS: /api/settings/guest POST voice_model=emma then GET confirms persistence
PASS: /api/tts/generate with voice_id=emma returns audio_url (base64 data URL)
PASS: manifest.json has 4 icons (192x192 + 512x512, both 'any' and 'maskable' purpose)
PASS: manifest.json has 2 screenshots (form_factor='wide' and form_factor='narrow')
PASS: /narvo-icon-192.png returns valid PNG (verified PNG magic bytes)
PASS: Desktop player bar visible (data-testid='audio-player-bar') with progress line
PASS: Speed control button (data-testid='speed-control') shows '1x' default, cycles to '1.25x' on click
PASS: Desktop player has play/pause, prev, next, queue toggle buttons
PASS: Mobile mini-player (data-testid='mobile-mini-player') appears when audio is playing
PASS: Mobile expanded player (data-testid='mobile-player-modal') has mobile speed control (data-testid='mobile-speed-control')
PASS: Dashboard loads with FEATURED_TRANSMISSION and SYNTHESIZED_NEWS_STREAMS
PASS: Tools page shows YarnGPT, RSS Feeds (feedparser), Shadcn/UI entries
PASS: Settings page has Interest Matrix section (data-testid='interest-matrix-section')
test_credentials: Guest mode: Click '[Oya, Play]' on landing page. Dismiss SKIP_TOUR modal when it appears.
seed_data_creation: voice_model=emma set for guest settings during API testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 14 features tested and verified. Speed control cycles through 0.75x/1x/1.25x/1.5x/2x on both desktop (data-testid='speed-control') and mobile (data-testid='mobile-speed-control'). PWA manifest has proper PNG icons (not SVG data URIs) and screenshots with form_factor for installability. Mobile mini-player only renders when currentTrack is set. Tour modal appears on first visit and may intercept clicks - use force=True or keyboard Escape to dismiss.

podcasts_expanded_feeds.notes: 10 RSS feeds configured, returns episodes from multiple sources

mobile_speed_control.notes: data-testid='mobile-speed-control' in expanded modal, cycles on click

mobile_mini_player.notes: data-testid='mobile-mini-player' appears when audio playing at 375px

tools_page_entries.notes: YarnGPT, feedparser (RSS Feeds), Shadcn/UI all present
